desc.en: 老師和學生們在外圍1區前發現次元引擎，並且遇見了阻擋次元引擎的無名守護者、以及白子。
desc.jp: 老師和學生們在外圍1區前發現次元引擎，並且遇見了阻擋次元引擎的無名守護者、以及白子。

desc.en: 外圍1區前擊破次元引擎的老師。白子利用傳送門撤退，老師則前往下一個區域。
desc.jp: 外圍1區前擊破次元引擎的老師。白子利用傳送門撤退，老師則前往下一個區域。

desc.en: Rin is the Vice President of the General Student Council. She appears in the Tutorial and Volume Final.
desc.jp: Rin is the Vice President of the General Student Council. She appears in the Tutorial and Volume Final.
desc.thai: Rin is the Vice President of the General Student Council. She appears in the Tutorial and Volume Final.
desc.ko: Rin is the Vice President of the General Student Council. She appears in the Tutorial and Volume Final.
desc.zh_tw: 琳是聯邦學生會的副會長，在新手教程以及終章中出現過。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 琳是联邦学生会的副会长，在新手教程以及终章中出现过。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 琳是联邦学生会的副会长，在新手教程以及终章中出现过。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 琳是联邦学生会的副会长，在新手教程以及终章中出现过。

desc.en: Ayumu is a member of the General Student Council.
desc.jp: Ayumu is a member of the General Student Council.
desc.thai: Ayumu is a member of the General Student Council.
desc.ko: Ayumu is a member of the General Student Council.
desc.zh_tw: Ayumu is a member of the General Student Council.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 步是联邦学生会的一名成员。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 步是联邦学生会的一名成员。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 步是联邦学生会的一名成员。

desc.en: Momoka is the chief of the General Student Council's Transportation Office. She appears in the Tutorial and some other stories. She has a lazy personality, prefers to avoiding things, and likes eating the chips all the time. Under the current situation, her main task is to distribute tasks to Sensei.
desc.jp: Momoka is the chief of the General Student Council's Transportation Office. She appears in the Tutorial and some other stories. She has a lazy personality, prefers to avoiding things, and likes eating the chips all the time. Under the current situation, her main task is to distribute tasks to Sensei.
desc.thai: Momoka is the chief of the General Student Council's Transportation Office. She appears in the Tutorial and some other stories. She has a lazy personality, prefers to avoiding things, and likes eating the chips all the time. Under the current situation, her main task is to distribute tasks to Sensei.
desc.ko: Momoka is the chief of the General Student Council's Transportation Office. She appears in the Tutorial and some other stories. She has a lazy personality, prefers to avoiding things, and likes eating the chips all the time. Under the current situation, her main task is to distribute tasks to Sensei.
desc.zh_tw: 桃香是基沃託斯學生會交通部的部長，在新手教程以及其他一些劇情中均有出現。個人性格很懶，喜歡逃避事情，還喜歡天天吃她的明太子味薯片。在當前設定下，桃香的主要任務就是把任務分配給老師做。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 桃香是基沃托斯学生会交通部的部长，在新手教程以及其他一些剧情中均有出现。个人性格很懒，喜欢逃避事情，还喜欢天天吃她的明太子味薯片。在当前设定下，桃香的主要任务就是把任务分配给老师做。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 桃香是基沃托斯学生会交通部的部长，在新手教程以及其他一些剧情中均有出现。个人性格很懒，喜欢逃避事情，还喜欢天天吃她的明太子味薯片。在当前设定下，桃香的主要任务就是把任务分配给老师做。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 桃香是基沃托斯学生会交通部的部长，在新手教程以及其他一些剧情中均有出现。个人性格很懒，喜欢逃避事情，还喜欢天天吃她的明太子味薯片。在当前设定下，桃香的主要任务就是把任务分配给老师做。

desc.en: Shiroko (Terror) is a student appearing in Volume Final. She's essentially an alternative version of Shiroko, but interacted with Chroma and became a Nameless Goddess. She has close relationships with Phrenapates, who seemed to be the Sensei of her own.
desc.jp: Shiroko (Terror) is a student appearing in Volume Final. She's essentially an alternative version of Shiroko, but interacted with Chroma and became a Nameless Goddess. She has close relationships with Phrenapates, who seemed to be the Sensei of her own.
desc.thai: Shiroko (Terror) is a student appearing in Volume Final. She's essentially an alternative version of Shiroko, but interacted with Chroma and became a Nameless Goddess. She has close relationships with Phrenapates, who seemed to be the Sensei of her own.
desc.ko: Shiroko (Terror) is a student appearing in Volume Final. She's essentially an alternative version of Shiroko, but interacted with Chroma and became a Nameless Goddess. She has close relationships with Phrenapates, who seemed to be the Sensei of her own.
desc.zh_tw: Shiroko (Terror) is a student appearing in Volume Final. She's essentially an alternative version of Shiroko, but interacted with Chroma and became a Nameless Goddess. She has close relationships with Phrenapates, who seemed to be the Sensei of her own.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 白子（恐怖）是一名在最终篇中出现的学生。她本质上就是普通白子的另一版本，只不过接触了色彩并成为了无名众神的一员。她与诱骗者的关系很近，后者似乎是她的老师。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 白子（恐怖）是一名在最终篇中出现的学生。她本质上就是普通白子的另一版本，只不过接触了色彩并成为了无名众神的一员。她与诱骗者的关系很近，后者似乎是她的老师。

desc.en: 老師質問另一位白子的意圖，後者表示她是來阻止老師破壞方舟的，如此便能將基沃託斯導向終點。
desc.jp: 老師質問另一位白子的意圖，後者表示她是來阻止老師破壞方舟的，如此便能將基沃託斯導向終點。
desc.thai: 老師質問另一位白子的意圖，後者表示她是來阻止老師破壞方舟的，如此便能將基沃託斯導向終點。
desc.ko: 老師質問另一位白子的意圖，後者表示她是來阻止老師破壞方舟的，如此便能將基沃託斯導向終點。
desc.zh_tw: 老師質問另一位白子的意圖，後者表示她是來阻止老師破壞方舟的，如此便能將基沃託斯導向終點。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 老师质问另一位白子的意图，后者表示她是来阻止老师破坏方舟的，如此便能将基沃托斯导向终点。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 老师质问另一位白子的意图，后者表示她是来阻止老师破坏方舟的，如此便能将基沃托斯导向终点。

desc.en: 綾音向對策委員會報告“白子”的出現，但此時對策委員會正忙於對付敵人。星野讓三人專心應敵，將白子留給老師。
desc.jp: 綾音向對策委員會報告“白子”的出現，但此時對策委員會正忙於對付敵人。星野讓三人專心應敵，將白子留給老師。

desc.zh_cn_jp: 绫音向对策委员会报告“白子”的出现，但此时对策委员会正忙于对付敌人。星野让三人专心应敌，将白子留给老师。

desc.en: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.jp: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.

desc.zh_cn: 举例/联想：FEEEEVER TIME、Undefined Behavior、Goal Wo Nerae!；总体上基本与Uplifting的风格和战斗曲重合。
desc.zh_tw: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.

desc.en: Most battle tracks have this characteristic. The general representation includes fast drums and featuring multiple elements in a short period of time.
desc.jp: Most battle tracks have this characteristic. The general representation includes fast drums and featuring multiple elements in a short period of time.
desc.thai: Most battle tracks have this characteristic. The general representation includes fast drums and featuring multiple elements in a short period of time.
desc.ko: Most battle tracks have this characteristic. The general representation includes fast drums and featuring multiple elements in a short period of time.
desc.zh_cn: 大部分战斗曲均具备此特性，一般的表现形式为鼓点快、元素偏多的情况。
desc.zh_tw: Most battle tracks have this characteristic. The general representation includes fast drums and featuring multiple elements in a short period of time.

desc.en: The 101th track in Blue Archive OST, used especially during the battle of the event "The Ark of Atrahasis Conquest."
desc.jp: The 101th track in Blue Archive OST, used especially during the battle of the event "The Ark of Atrahasis Conquest."
desc.thai: The 101th track in Blue Archive OST, used especially during the battle of the event "The Ark of Atrahasis Conquest."
desc.ko: The 101th track in Blue Archive OST, used especially during the battle of the event "The Ark of Atrahasis Conquest."
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第101首曲子，在最终篇第三章占领方舟的活动战斗任务里使用。
desc.zh_tw: The 101th track in Blue Archive OST, used especially during the battle of the event "The Ark of Atrahasis Conquest."

desc.en: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.jp: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.thai: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.ko: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.zh_cn: 举例/联想：FEEEEVER TIME、Undefined Behavior、Goal Wo Nerae!；总体上基本与Uplifting的风格和战斗曲重合。
desc.zh_tw: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.

desc.en: Most battle tracks have this characteristic. The general representation includes fast drums and featuring multiple elements in a short period of time.
desc.jp: Most battle tracks have this characteristic. The general representation includes fast drums and featuring multiple elements in a short period of time.
desc.thai: Most battle tracks have this characteristic. The general representation includes fast drums and featuring multiple elements in a short period of time.
desc.ko: Most battle tracks have this characteristic. The general representation includes fast drums and featuring multiple elements in a short period of time.
desc.zh_cn: 大部分战斗曲均具备此特性，一般的表现形式为鼓点快、元素偏多的情况。
desc.zh_tw: Most battle tracks have this characteristic. The general representation includes fast drums and featuring multiple elements in a short period of time.

desc.en: 成功突入方舟後，「阿特拉哈西斯的方舟占領戰」正式開始。與次元引擎及其守護者展開的激戰──究竟，在這場戰鬥的盡頭等待著的會是什麼呢……？
